Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2015 10:03AM Sophistikatie wrote: Hi, My friend was diagnosed with breast cancer last year, she is 36. It was also in 39 of her lymph nodes (i think) by the time she found the lump. She underwent chemo and has just finished her radiation too this week and is going on a chemo pill too soon and a pill to bring on menopause. However she has just been told that it has now spread to her ovaries. Does this mean it is metastatic and is Stage IV? She meets with her consultant tomorrow for the full story but I am driving myself mad researching and would love to hear your thoughts.
Posts.Title: If you are not Stage IV but have questions, you may post here chrissyb Olma61

She only found the lump this time last year.
